testcase.name: Verify user is able to Compare the products - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the home page..............................................passed And the page title is "Home Page"...........................................passed And User clicks on the header sign-in link..................................passed And "Customer Login" page is displayed......................................passed When User enters the email address "Test121@yopmail.com" and password "Test12345".passed And User clicks on the sign-in button.......................................passed Then User should be logged in...............................................passed And User scrolls all the way down to hot seller section.....................passed When Clicks on three bar button to add first Fusion Backpack to compare list.passed Then You added product Fusion Backpack to the comparison list shows up......passed And Clicks on three bar button to add secound Push It Messenger Bag to compare list.passed Then You added secound product Push It Messenger Bag to the comparison list shows up.passed Then Click compare products.................................................passed And User get directed to "Compare Products" page............................passed Then Check the products added Fusion Backpack and Push It Messenger Bag to the list are same products user has added by comparing name,SKU and description.passed
